content: The question now is .. Can we? Social media is much like any other form of transmitting communication and messages. What we all hoped — well all the non -trumpers, and the rest of the world (haha) was that there would be a minimum level of decency and respect for the office from the new USA leader. Instead a liar -in-chief, King obnoxious and a sinister racist degenerate, among other things got into the highest office and has brought it into disrepute. What now? Change the player or change the game..you choose!
